Uses of Class
uniandes.unacloud.web.pmallocators.AllocatorException

  • Packages that use AllocatorException 
    Package Description
    uniandes.unacloud.web.pmallocators
    In this package are located all allocator algorithms to assign executions to physical machines.

    • Uses of AllocatorException in uniandes.unacloud.web.pmallocators

      Extends BEST FIT algorithm adding user as a variable in sort process
      protected void SingletonAllocator.allocateExecutions(List<Execution> executionList, List<PhysicalMachine> physicalMachines, Map<Long,PhysicalMachineAllocationDescription> physicalMachineDescriptions)
      Assigns only one execution for each physical machine
      protected void RoundRobinAllocator.allocateExecutions(List<Execution> executionList, List<PhysicalMachine> physicalMachines, Map<Long,PhysicalMachineAllocationDescription> physicalMachineDescriptions)
      Assigns an execution for each physical machine order by physical machine id
      protected void RandomAllocator.allocateExecutions(List<Execution> executionList, List<PhysicalMachine> physicalMachines, Map<Long,PhysicalMachineAllocationDescription> physicalMachineDescriptions)
      Assigns an execution to a physical machine based in random number.
      protected void FirstFitDecreasingAllocator.allocateExecutions(List<Execution> executionList, List<PhysicalMachine> physicalMachines, Map<Long,PhysicalMachineAllocationDescription> physicalMachineDescriptions)
      It sorts physical machines based in available resources, assigns an execution in first machine in list and sorts again.
      protected void FirstFitAllocator.allocateExecutions(List<Execution> executionList, List<PhysicalMachine> physicalMachines, Map<Long,PhysicalMachineAllocationDescription> physicalMachineDescriptions)
      Assigns all possible executions for each physical machine based in available resources

      Method to match physical machines with executions.
